component.name: GSEAOverlap
component.doc: Overlap analysis of enriched gene sets based on shared core enrichment genes.
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: enrichedGeneSets
input.doc: Array of CSV files with enriched gene sets as produced by component GSEA.

output.name: overlaps
output.doc: Overlapping gene set pairs together with shared core enrichment genes.

parameter.name: caption
parameter.default: Hierarchical clustering of enriched gene sets.

parameter.name: regexGeneSetNames
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set names to be included in analysis.

parameter.name: regexGeneSetNamesExclude
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set names to be excluded from analysis.

parameter.name: regexCategoryNames
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set categories to be included in analysis.

parameter.name: regexCategoryNamesExclude
parameter.doc: Regular expression matching gene set categories to be excluded from analysis.

parameter.name: similarityCutoffTree
parameter.doc: Minimum Jaccard index for dendrogram output. Gene sets with no single overlapping gene set above this cut-off are removed from the tree. Default is to include all gene sets (= no similarity filtering).

parameter.name: similarityCutoffTable
parameter.doc: Minimum Jaccard index for table output. If two overlapping gene sets are below this cut-off, the pair is removed.

parameter.name: sigCutoff
parameter.doc: FDR cut-off for a gene set to be included in analysis.

parameter.name: hsigCutoff
parameter.doc: FDR cut-off for a gene set to be highlighted in dendrogram.
